entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with wet snow overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
